channel.title: Will someone plz help me! with commands
channel.description:
i need help with my commands when i got my server source the old owner had his own commands and only he could use them but now i have them so i want them to beable to work on my other co owners how do i fix!
and if u have aim instant message me at hckywaynegretzky[br][size=1]Posted on: June 17, 2007, 11:34:58 PM[/size][hr]comon guys plz!! no ones helping me :(

item.title: Will someone plz help me! with commands
item.dc:creator: @Killer_Coder Killer Coder
item.description:
@Killer_Coder wrote:

an easy way to make commands is to dl a command maker(off the downloads forum)

they always work perfect except with one of them it comes out with an ) instead of }

Read full topic
item.source: Will someone plz help me! with commands

item.title: Will someone plz help me! with commands
item.dc:creator: @NexondotNet NexondotNet
item.description:
@NexondotNet wrote:

A command looks like this >

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("NAME"))

…

If you want to make it admin only you add

&& playerRights >= 2

So it will look like -

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("NAME") && playerRights >= 2)

zzz

Read full topic
item.source: Will someone plz help me! with commands

item.title: Will someone plz help me! with commands
item.dc:creator: @Pur3_Mag3 Pur3 Mag3
item.description:
@Pur3_Mag3 wrote:

Go to your command.
See the bit that sais:

 && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("NAME")

Replace that with

 && playerRights >= 2

Now admins+ can use it.

Read full topic
